Starstorm:

Starstorm arrived to the area where Celeron--Salvage's ship was, she 
stopped there and waited to Tankor




--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Hydras/StarStorm/Perceptor:
> 
> Hydras growled annoyed and said by comlink "Go to the follow 
> Coordinates, a new ship has arrived (Celeron--Salvage's ship ) and 
I 
> need to know if they could be allies or foes... but have 
caution... 
> we're not in position to stand a war with our current base, take 
> StarStorm and move now"
> 
> Startorm nodded and soon left the base, expecting that Tankor 
would 
> follow her.
> 
> An lookin to Perceptor, Hydras said "You know what to do with the 
> new pod.."
> 
> "YOu know that I'll fight to get it"replied Perceptor
> 
> "Then  do it"said Hydras.
> 
> Perceptor left the base and taking his Vehicle mode, he moved 
> towards the pod that was near of Predacon Base
